data.name: Hurst Glass and Screen
data.address: 900 Barbara Ann Dr Ste A, Hurst, TX 76053

reviews.text: Family-owned retailer stocking glass & screen products for residential & commercial use. 900 Barbara Ann Dr Ste A, Hurst, TX 76053 Closes soon · 5 PM · Opens 8:30 AM Tue Updated by phone call 4 weeks ago
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"Great service, prices and installation; my bathrooms look awesome!" "Just finished a five bathroom remodel project in my home." "I contracted Hurst Glass for custom showers door and was quoted a great price."

Great service. Better prices! I needed 6 replacement panes of seeded glass for my cabinets. First place I called was $1200. Just the glass, no installation. I knew that was wrong. Hurst Glass was $450. Big difference. My panes were ready in less than a week. Highly recommend. Response from the owner 6 months ago

I have used this business now to repair a torn screen door and window on 2 different occasions. They were awesome both times! I was so surprised at how affordable it was and kicked myself for waiting as long as I did for the repair. One … More
Chris and the team did a great job replacing all my windows and adding 80% solar screens. Very happy with their work. Highly recommend.
